footer.tagline: Upgrading cybersecurity with explainable multi-agent systems

preview.banner: ColleaiQ is under active development. Write to kontakt@colleaiq.dk

hero.headline: Where Artificial Intelligence meets collective intelligence
hero.paragraph1: Most security tools sit on top of logs and infrastructure and wait for something to look wrong. They are great at flagging known patterns and policy violations, but they rarely explore how an attacker could actually move through your environment. Misconfigurations and weak paths can sit untouched for months, simply because nobody has walked them end-to-end.
hero.paragraph2: ColleaiQ is a multi-agent AI system that continuously rehearses realistic attacks in a sandbox that mirrors your setup. Specialised agents coordinate to explore attack paths, collect evidence and propose concrete actions. A human analyst stays in the loop to review and refine the results, so automation handles the repetitive exploration while judgement, risk appetite and final decisions remain human.
hero.latestPost: Latest post: Safe Sandbox Threat Hunting →

challenge.headline: The Challenge
challenge.paragraph1: If you've lived in a SOC, you know the pattern: signatures, threat feeds, a quarterly pentest, and a SIEM that never sleeps. Useful—just late.
challenge.paragraph2: Exposures spread faster than patches. Regulators ask for proof, not vibes. And most alerts arrive without the context you need to act.
challenge.paragraph3: With headcount tight, we need proactive work that doesn't touch production and produces evidence you can take to an auditor or a board.

howItWorks.headline: How ColleaiQ Works
howItWorks.description: Think of ColleaiQ as a digital blue team you supervise. Our agents explore realistic paths an attacker would try—inside a sandbox that mirrors your setup. We record what we attempted, what we saw and why it matters, then draft a practical fix. An analyst approves or edits the plan, and that decision teaches the system what to focus on next.

whyTeams.headline: Why teams work with us
whyTeams.description: Less noise, more signal. Each finding shows the attempt, the evidence, the impact, and the next step—no detective work required. It's easy to brief and easy to audit, which means fixes actually get done.

whatYouGet.headline: What you get today
whatYouGet.description: We're in alpha with a handful of partners. Today you get: safe sandbox simulations; evidence-first reports with affected assets and a proposed fix; analyst-in-the-loop approval; and a clean audit trail built for EU workflows. We integrate and price through partners like itm8. We're not claiming autonomous red teaming.

rehearsal.headline: Safe rehearsal: exposure → sandbox → observations
rehearsal.description: A new exposure pops up. We translate it into a realistic path and run it in the sandbox—never on live systems—then collect what really happened.

learning.headline: Analyst approval and learning loop
learning.description: We suggest a fix. A human approves or adjusts, and that feedback shapes the next run. Over time, the system gets sharper without changing your risk appetite.

compliance.headline: Compliance & documentation
compliance.description: Every result links attempt → evidence → impact → decision. That gives you the artefacts to show risk management, testing activity and documented responses under NIS2. We don't certify you—we help you prove what you did and why.
compliance.imageAlt: Structured finding with evidence and decision log

builtFor.headline: Built for Enterprise Security Teams
builtFor.ciso: CISOs & leaders: continuous validation you can explain in one slide, with artefacts that stand up in audit.
builtFor.redTeams: Red teams & testers: let the system handle routine recon so you can spend time on bespoke tradecraft.
builtFor.regulated: Regulated orgs: repeatable runs and clear evidence for finance, healthcare and critical infrastructure.

fromLab.headline: From the lab
fromLab.postExcerpt: We rehearse attacks in a sandbox that mirrors production—never on live systems—and deliver evidence, impact, and a practical fix for human approval.

whyColleaiQ.headline: Why ColleaiQ
whyColleaiQ.point1: Built in Copenhagen with focus on European workflows and explainability.
whyColleaiQ.point2: Context over alerts: findings connect attempt, observation, and relevance to your environment.
whyColleaiQ.point3: Gets better with use: analyst feedback guides the agents, so each run sharpens the next.

finalCTA.headline: Ready to move from reactive to proactive?
finalCTA.description: If you want rehearsals instead of surprises, let's talk. We'll map your setup, agree on what "good" looks like, and onboard you to a pilot where every run is explainable and human-approved.

hero.headline: Our Mission
hero.subtitle: We bridge advanced AI and cybersecurity to create proactive, explainable protection for organizations that cannot wait for the next incident.

vision.headline: Vision
vision.description: 2025 has been called the year of agentic AI. ColleaiQ explores the natural next step: multi-agent networks. Our goal is to make this approach usable in European cybersecurity—so defense can get ahead of threats.

platform.description: Specialized AI agents simulate realistic attacker behavior in secure, contained environments and translate findings into clear, auditable actions your SOC can use.

genesis.title: Genesis
genesis.description: The multi-agent foundation began in support/HR tasks. The complexity fit better in technical domains.

pivot.title: Strategic Pivot
pivot.description: Conversations with Danish IT and security companies pointed to a gap in cybersecurity—here our technology matched the challenge.

innovation.title: Innovation Focus
innovation.description: We build the bridge between AI and security: from agentic AI to collaborative multi-agent networks.

leadership.title: European Leadership
leadership.description: We develop in Denmark with an eye on EU needs, data handling, and documentation requirements.

threat.title: The European threat landscape
threat.description: An intensified security environment demands robust digital infrastructure and operations.

vulnerability.title: Digital vulnerability
vulnerability.description: Denmark is highly digital—the benefits come with increased risk. Many companies are not adequately secured.

wakeup.title: Wake-up call
wakeup.description: NotPetya against Mærsk in 2017 cost up to DKK 2 billion. Downtime costs—even today.

sovereignty.title: Digital sovereignty
sovereignty.description: Danish-developed technology, scalable in the EU, aligned with European sovereignty goals.

mission.description: To become a natural tool in the work for cybersecurity and sovereignty—explainable and secure AI for high-risk sectors such as energy, defense, shipping and critical infrastructure.

hero.headline: Our Solution
hero.subtitle: A multi-agent AI system that defends proactively through continuous attack simulations and explainable recommendations.

multiAgent.title: Multi-agent collaboration
multiAgent.description: Specialized agents work together. "Red" simulates, "blue" monitors and defends.

traceable.title: Traceable recommendations
traceable.description: Every action is explainable and auditable—helps with NIS2 documentation.

learning.title: Continuous learning
learning.description: Agents learn from analyst decisions and results—sharpen rules and focus over time.

architecture.headline: Architecture
architecture.redTeam: Red team agent → simulates threats in sandbox.
architecture.blueTeam: Blue team agent → gathers signals, explains findings and proposes remediation.
architecture.sandbox: Sandbox environment → secure, isolated, mirrors production.
architecture.explainable: Explainable outputs → context, rationale and audit trail.

cycle.headline: Continuous defense cycle — example (Credential Dumping)
cycle.red: Red: simulates LSASS extraction in sandbox
cycle.solution: Solution: generate EDR rule with audit trail

benefits.headline: Benefits
benefits.benefit4: Explainable AI for audit and compliance

technical.headline: Technical Foundation
technical.description: Generative models combined with graph analysis, RL and deterministic logic. Expertise from security specialists is integrated for explainable, credible results.

cta.headline: Ready to see it in practice?
cta.description: Experience how our multi-agent system can elevate your security.

hero.headline: Blog
hero.subtitle: Brief field notes while we build ColleaiQ—what we tried, what worked, and what we changed.

safeSandbox.title: Safe Sandbox Threat Hunting
safeSandbox.excerpt: We rehearse attacks in a sandbox that mirrors production—never on live systems—and deliver evidence, impact, and a practical fix for human approval.

hero.headline: Team
hero.subtitle: Three founders building sober, proactive cybersecurity.

martin.title: CTO & Co-founder
martin.description: Builds the technical platform for our multi-agent system.

careers.headline: Open Positions
careers.intro: We're a small team and we hire rarely and deliberately. There are no open roles right now.
careers.thesisDescription: We're keen to partner with Master's thesis or PhD students on topics like explainable multi-agent systems, sandboxed cyber simulations, model evaluation/reproducibility, reinforcement learning, graph analytics, and auditability for NIS2. We can offer real problem statements, synthetic/bench data, weekly check-ins, and co-authorship where relevant.
careers.interestedDescription: Use the Contact page to write us a short note (e.g., "Thesis/PhD partnership" or "Future roles").

hero.headline: Compliance & Security
hero.subtitle: Built for EU requirements—transparent, auditable, and aligned with digital sovereignty.

nis2.headline: NIS2
nis2.description: EU's NIS2 sets stricter requirements for critical infrastructure and essential services. ColleaiQ helps with:
nis2.risk: Continuous risk assessment—proactive simulations find weaknesses early.
nis2.incident: Incident response—explainable recommendations for rapid reaction.
nis2.management: Security management—complete logging and audit trail.

features.headline: Security & Compliance Features
features.secure: Secure development practices (sandbox, privacy, human control)

documentation.headline: Documentation?
documentation.description: Contact us for your specific requirements. We deliver detailed documentation and evidence for audits and certifications.

contact.headline: Contact ColleaiQ
contact.description: We're here to answer questions, discuss pilots, or explore thesis/PhD partnerships. Reach out below.
contact.formSuccess: Thank you for your message. We'll get back to you soon!
contact.demoDescription: Want to see our platform in action? Schedule a demo with our team.
